style_guide.visual_style: High-quality Korean webtoon style with clean digital illustration, soft natural colors, expressive faces, modern fashion, atmospheric lighting
style_guide.segment_story: A conversation between a male and female friend at the gym. The female invites the male to work out together, they discuss workout schedules and routines (he goes at 6pm, does weights and cardio for about an hour), then they exercise side by side - him doing bench press while she does squats - encouraging each other with motivational phrases to push harder and complete one more set together.

images.prompt_used:
# High-Quality Korean Webtoon Style Gym Scene - Two Characters

A handsome young Korean male in his early 20s and an athletic young Korean female in her early 20s standing together inside a modern gym, having a friendly conversation near the entrance area. Both characters visible from shoulders up filling significant frame space, positioned naturally in the same unified environment.

**Male Character (left side):**
- Textured medium-length dark brown hair with soft bangs and subtle highlights
- Friendly approachable expression with soft smile
- Warm brown eyes with detailed sparkle highlights
- Defined jawline, clear facial features
- Wearing beige oversized knit sweater with visible white collared shirt underneath
- Natural rosy blush on cheeks

**Female Character (right side):**
- Trendy Korean hairstyle with soft waves
- Friendly approachable smile with detailed expressive eyes
- Natural blush on cheeks, sparkle highlights in eyes
- Athletic feminine build
- Wearing stylish fitted pastel pink sports tank top
- Shoulders and upper body visible

**Environment - Modern Gym Interior:**
- Real gym setting with visible equipment in background
- Weight racks and exercise machines slightly blurred
- Clean modern fitness center atmosphere
- Large windows with natural daylight streaming in
- Polished floors reflecting ambient light
- Contemporary gym decor with neutral tones

**Webtoon Premium Quality:**
- Smooth digital illustration with clean professional linework
- Soft natural color palette with warm muted tones
- Atmospheric lighting with gentle rim light on both characters
- Subtle gradients and smooth shading transitions
- Depth of field effect - characters sharp, background softly blurred
- Professional Naver/Lezhin webtoon rendering quality
- No harsh outlines, painterly digital style
- Natural skin texture with soft highlights

Single unified scene, both characters in same space, no split-screen, no dividers, no text, no speech bubbles, 1080x1080 pixels, square format, premium Korean webtoon aesthetic

High-quality Korean webtoon style gym scene, medium close-up shot. A young athletic Korean female in early 20s in the foreground, wearing stylish fitted pastel pink sports tank top and matching leggings, trendy Korean hairstyle with soft waves, detailed expressive eyes with sparkle highlights, natural blush on cheeks, warm friendly smile with inviting expression, one hand gesturing welcomingly toward camera in friendly invitation pose. Behind her and slightly to the side, a handsome young Korean male in his early 20s, athletic build, textured medium-length dark brown hair with soft bangs, warm brown eyes, wearing beige oversized knit sweater with visible white collared shirt underneath, friendly smile looking at her with interested expression. Modern gym interior background with weight equipment, mirrors, and exercise machines slightly blurred in depth of field. Smooth digital illustration with clean professional linework, soft natural color palette with warm muted tones, atmospheric lighting with gentle rim light on characters, subtle gradients and smooth shading transitions, professional Naver webtoon rendering quality, no text, no speech bubbles, conversational moment capturing invitation energy
